summary_text: A captain and his team of 12 soldiers infiltrate a secret underground bunker to take out a target in the Korean demilitarized zone.

name: Don't Go in the Woods
summary_text: A young band heads to the woods in order to focus on writing new songs. Hoping to emerge with new music that will score them their big break, they instead find themselves in the middle of a nightmare beyond comprehension.

name: A Bunch of Amateurs

name: A Dose of Happiness
summary_text: The real story of the journalist Vesela Toteva (in the role is her daughter -Valentina Karoleva) searching for her own happiness during the dynamic and uncertain 90's in Bulgaria. A tale about drugs, fall, fear and redemption.

name: Harry + Max
summary_text: Two brothers, 23 and 16, who are both teen idols, come to terms with their dysfunctional family past and deep affection for each other.

name: Lucía, Lucía
summary_text: A woman trying to cope with the recent disappearance of her husband finds that the event uncovers some dark secrets. Subtitled.

name: Grass
summary_text: In a small Café, Min-hee Kim plays a guest who prefers to observe but not interact with the other guests herself.

name: LX 2048
summary_text: A fatally ill man tries to secure the future of his family in a world where the toxicity of the sun forces people to stay inside during the daytime.

name: Outback
summary_text: Down Under for an adventure-filled vacation, a young American couple quickly find themselves stranded in the unforgiving Australian outback.

name: The Unseen
summary_text: A man who abandoned his family now risks everything to find his missing daughter, including exposing the secret that he is becoming invisible.

name: Yeok-rin
summary_text: King Jeongjo (Hyun-Bin) attempts to protect his royal powers from the conflict of two factions: Noron and Soron.

summary_text: Rise and fall of actor Ferdinand Marian, who takes the chance and stars in the anti-semitic movie Jud Süß (1940).

name: Zenith
summary_text: A retro-futuristic steam-punk thriller, about two men in two time periods, whose search for the same grand conspiracy leads them to question their own humanity.

summary_text: A Romeo-and-Juliet kind of love affair. The difference here is what sets the two lovers apart: their soccer teams. Being a fan of Corinthians, Romeu has to fake he really likes Palmeiras, in order to gain Julieta's heart.

summary_text: In Eastern Finland, in Liperi to be exact, Anna-Liisa Ihalainen asks her husband Antti to get some matches from the Ihalainen household. Unfortunately that trip takes a little longer than expected.

name: The Pom Pom Girls
summary_text: A group of carefree high school seniors are having the time of their lives, filled with sex, romance, and teen high jinks.

name: Champagne for Caesar
summary_text: In order to get even with the pompous president of a soap company, an eccentric genius goes on his quiz show in order to bankrupt his company.

summary_text: Two window washers mistakenly receive, and lose, $50,000 belonging to a shady bookie, and have only forty-eight hours to retrieve the money.

name: The Doorway to Hell
summary_text: Despite his efforts to go straight, a young gangster keeps falling back into crime.

name: Can't Buy My Love
summary_text: A spoiled rich man doesn't take it well when he's rejected by an ambulance paramedic. He doesn't give up there but uses his parents' wealth to get to ride with her in the ambulance hoping that it will eventually lead to a date etc.

name: Zombie Shark
summary_text: A perfect getaway for four friends turns into survival when they fight an experimental shark.

name: Killing Daddy
summary_text: When Callie discovers that her father has had a debilitating stroke, she sees it as the perfect opportunity to return home and seek justice for her mother.

name: Sangue del mio sangue
summary_text: Balancing between the past and the present, the darkness and the light, within the musky stone walls of Santa Chiara's 17th-century convent prison in Bobbio, a sinful Sister and a cultivated night owl Count are somehow linked together.

name: Holly's Holiday
summary_text: NYC ad exec Holly Maddux dreams of the perfect life, the perfect job, and of course, the perfect man to sweep her off her feet. When she wakes up one day to find the "perfect man" awaiting her, who is nothing more than a mannequin come to life, she must decides if "perfect" is the perfect fit for her.

name: Kiss at Pine Lake
summary_text: A boy and a girl fall in love during summer camp and promise to stay in touch, but they don't. Fifteen years later they meet again in the same camp under very different circumstances. What will happen to the camp and will they try again?

name: Schemer
summary_text: The haunting search to discover why fifteen-year old Jessie was murdered by her closest friends.

name: Awful Nice
summary_text: Jim has to find his immature brother, then pay him to come to their dad's funeral. They inherit a cabin together. Will the time together, driving to Branson and then fixing the cabin to sell it, turn hatred to brotherly love?

name: Operation Belvis Bash

name: SoulBoy
summary_text: A coming-of-age drama set in the 1970s Northern Soul underground music scene.

name: Geomeun jip

name: Main Aisa Hi Hoon

summary_text: G.I. Gurdjieff is a spiritual teacher and mystic who, after a lifetime study, developed a form of meditation incorporating modern dance.

summary_text: After being murdered by his rivals, Petey Wheatstraw is resurrected, in exchange for marrying the devil's daughter, the world's ugliest woman.

summary_text: Zatoichi runs afoul of some evil fugitives, working for a corrupt law official.

summary_text: In Jerusalem, a bullied teen befriends his grandfather and long lost uncle and soon they decide to solve their financial problems by robbing a bank.

summary_text: Against the backdrop of a missing girl case, lost souls throughout Los Angeles search for meaning and redemption and affect each other in ways they don't always see.

name: Triad Wars
summary_text: In the mist of a violent gang war, a series of unfortunate events threatens the fate of a powerful triad leader and his empire.

name: Choke
summary_text: The lines between reality and fiction, and good and bad blur when both a nihilistic detective and a serial killer's affairs with a mysterious girl overlap.

name: Nereikalingi zmones
summary_text: Mentally ill young woman Valda convinces herself that a boy growing up in an orphanage is her child. Following the footsteps of a thousands Lithuanians, she immigrates to Ireland to earn money to save him. "Loss" portrays beauty and tragedy in the human heart.

name: Rev
summary_text: A young thief with a history of grand theft auto becomes an informant and helps police bring down a criminal enterprise involved in the smuggling of hundreds of exotic super cars.

name: Gloss

name: Ljeto u zlatnoj dolini
summary_text: In a postwar Sarajevo, a young boy is trying to repay debt of his deceased father in a special Bosnian way.

name: Johnny

name: Harikrishnans

name: Little City
summary_text: San Francisco is a little city, where you keep running into the same 6 people, here 5 around 30 y.o. and a cougar on the prowl for young women, all going in and out of relationships.

name: The Silver Brumby
summary_text: A mother tells her daughter a fable about the prince of the brumbies, brumby being a term for the feral horses of Australia, who must find its place among its kind, while one man makes it his mission to capture it and tame it.

summary_text: Miami police fence stolen goods at a storefront-sting operation equipped with a two-way mirror.

name: Adua e le compagne
summary_text: When a brothel closes because of new laws, four of the prostitutes decide to go into business running a restaurant. They discover they cannot escape their past.

summary_text: In this spoof on crime films, four would-be criminals manage to botch every job they plan. When they try to rob wealthy Billy Gordon (Terry-Thomas) they fail again. But the gang decides to kidnap his daughter.

name: Enormous
summary_text: A world traveling pianist and her husband have decided not to have a baby, but then he sees a surprise childbirth on a flight and tampers with her pill.

name: Embattled
summary_text: A son aspires to follow in his famous MMA father's footsteps, but along his journey must figure out how to break the abusive cycle, if possible, that his father has continued.

name: Rail
summary_text: A cafeteria worker, a lovely young girl, and a gang of hijackers converge aboard a train.

name: Mood of the Day
summary_text: A womanizer and a cute woman (in a 10 year relationship going nowhere) on business trip are seated next to each other on a full train from Seoul to Busan. They start talking when she accepts she can't escape him.

name: Imaginary Friend
summary_text: A talented artist is haunted by the presence of a childhood imaginary friend, and her psychiatrist husband wants to have her committed to a mental institution.

name: Amphibious Creature of the Deep
summary_text: Marine biologist Skylar Shane hires an expat charter boat captain, Jack Bowman, to help her find prehistoric life form samples in the north Sumatran Sea. During the expedition, they run ...                See full summary »

name: Aetbaar
summary_text: A protective father starts digging deeper into the past of his daughter's possessive, unpredictable and violent boyfriend.

summary_text: Unemployed Scottish miner Danny Scoular (Liam Neeson) is forced into bare-knuckle boxing to make ends meet.

summary_text: Maxwell and Perry are forced in Military School after they've gone too far.

summary_text: Richard Pryor delivering his one-of-a-kind routine. One of his earliest live performances in 1971 at the Improvisation in New York.

name: The Hawaiians
summary_text: Captain Whip returns to Hawaii. He's inherited "worthless" land. He starts a plantation, staffed with a Chinese couple from his ship. Drilling thru lava for water and stealing/smuggling pineapple from French Guyana, things look brighter.

summary_text: Four adventurers descend to the depths of the ocean when the cable on their underwater diving bell snaps. The rest of their expedition, believing them to be lost, abandons hope of finding ...                See full summary »

summary_text: Etienne Alexis, a candidate for president of the new Europe, is a scientist promoting artificial insemination for social betterment and therapy to eliminate passion. His wealthy household (...                See full summary »

summary_text: A chorus girl falls in love with a wealthy young man, but their relationship is jeopardized by her mother's fears about the reaction of his family.

name: The Gorgeous Hussy

name: Huang jin shi dai
summary_text: The life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected the progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.

name: Sun Choke
summary_text: Janie's just trying to get well.

name: Black Forest
summary_text: Modern-day tourists find themselves lured into a deadly game in an alternate world where every fairy tale we were told at bedtime is real.

summary_text: 19-year old Belle practices playing the violin diligently, but is unable to impart her music with a sensitive undertone. Her life changes when she discovers that sexual desire stimulates passion in her music.

name: The Three Investigators and the Secret of Terror Castle
summary_text: When the case he's working on leads straight to Terror Castle, boy detective Jupiter Jones enlists the help of his two friends. Together they investigate the castle's many secrets, but end up finding more than they bargained for.

name: Between Us
summary_text: Two couples reunite over two incendiary evenings where anything can happen in this darkly comedic story of best friends, marriage, love, disappointment and dreams.

name: Sick Girl
summary_text: With her parents dead, an already unstable teenager embarks on a blood-soaked journey of torture, violence, and retribution, as everyone unlucky enough to cross paths with her ends up dead. Is the brutal Sick Girl capable of mercy?

name: Krishna Cottage
summary_text: A group of collegians are forced to take shelter in a mysterious Krishna Cottage for the night. Little do they know that the cottage is haunted by a spirit.

name: 50 Ways to Leave Your Lover
summary_text: A writer decides to leave Los Angeles to restart his life but before leaving, he meets the woman of his dreams and his plans quickly go awry.
